titleStmt.title: Memorials of worthy persons two decads / by Cl. Barksdale.
Memorials of worthy persons. Decades 1-2
titleStmt.author: Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

notesStmt.note: Reissued as: Characters and historical memorials, on the lives and actions of England's late worthies. 1662.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
